name: Muffin Man Adventures
description:
Muffin Man Adventures is a 2D game where you play a chef who is making Muffins and some ghosts have stolen his muffins.  You go on a spree to shoot ghosts until you have a change of heart and now you start feeding the ghosts.

You have to pick up coloured guns and shoot the corresponding coloured ghosts.
Controls -

 Left Click to shoot

A/D or Right/Left arrows - To Move

Space/W - To Jump

Alpha 1,2,3,4,5,6 keys - To change guns
